description: Glance trunk has just replaced image `type` with `disk_format` and `container_format`. In order to keep both trunks working together, we need to fix Nova to use the new-style ASAP.
title: Nova should use disk_format and container_format

comments.content: Glance trunk has just replaced image `type` with `disk_format` and `container_format`. In order to keep both trunks working together, we need to fix Nova to use the new-style ASAP.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
